title: (x) Bentley Motorcars profile humanist sans - Gill Sans {Jan E}
content:
Im trying to find the profile font for Bentley. I think its simmilar to AT Sackers Gothic/ Engravers Gothic but not quite. For exampel, the R has a slight curve. Thank you.  
Petter

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124155im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/BENTLEY_5843.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124155im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/BentleyII_4559.jpg)

author: plojel

comments.content: Yes it is. Thank you Jan!
